original_text: After that he poureth water into a bason, and began to wash the disciples' feet, and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded.
korean_text: 이에 대야에 물을 떠서 제자들의 발을 씻으시고 그 두르신 수건으로 닦기를 시작하여

sentences.original_text: After that he poureth water into a bason
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그는 대야에 물을 부었다

sentences.original_text: and began to wash the disciples' feet
and to wipe them with the towel
